definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: What motivates you to connect with a brand on a location-based service?
sentences.chinese: 什麼激勵你去把地理位置服務和品牌聯繫起來？

sentences.english: With its special location of Yueyang, its dialect is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 岳陽由於其地理位置的特殊性，方言十分複雜。

sentences.english: Putuo District possesses a preferable geographic location.
Venue - Authority of a court to hear a matter based on geographical location.
sentences.chinese: 法院審理案件的權力依據地理位置所做的劃分。

sentences.english: The superior geographical position is one which of substantial clauses Xuankong Temple can preserve complete.
sentences.chinese: 優越的地理位置是懸空寺能完好保存的重要原因之一。

sentences.english: Huashe enjoys excellent geographical location and is a land of opulence.
sentences.chinese: 華舍地理位置優越，物產豐富。

sentences.english: You can geotag and embed the panoramas in your own website.
sentences.chinese: 你可以設置地理位置標籤並嵌入到你的網站上。

sentences.english: That makes mobile search and location networks more appealing for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 這將讓手機搜索和地理位置服務變的更吸引人。

sentences.english: The country's geography ensures that spice is the essence of the cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 該國的地理位置確定了香料是其菜餚的主要特徵。

sentences.english: But given Padang's location, the much greater danger is tsunamis.
sentences.chinese: 因巴東的地理位置，更容易受海嘯的侵襲。

sentences.english: The geographical position is superior, the land, water and air traffic is convenient.
sentences.chinese: 地理位置優越，水陸空交通便捷。

sentences.english: Endowed with unique location, Hamburg becomes the center of water and land transportation.
sentences.chinese: 得天獨厚的地理位置，使漢堡成爲水陸交通的中心。

sentences.english: Real-time technology and location-based services are expected to drive mobile retail.
sentences.chinese: 實時技術和基於地理位置的服務將推動移動的應用。
它所處的地理位置真的很好。

sentences.english: Fushun City has an advantageous geographical location and convenient transportation.
sentences.chinese: 撫順市地理位置優越，交通發達。

sentences.english: The location(s) where trial-related activities are actually conducted.
sentences.chinese: 試驗相關的活動實際進行的地理位置。

definition: location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
to be located at/to be situated in
to be right next to/close neighbor
blessed by heaven (idiom)/enjoying exceptional advantages/favored by nature
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
